subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. shortened the 10-game suspension that Rangers forward Daniel Carcillo received for shoving a linesman on May 22 to six games, three of which have been served.
snippet: The N.H.L. shortened the 10-game suspension that Rangers forward Daniel Carcillo received for shoving a linesman on May 22 to six games, three of which have been served.
